videos.title: Would you wear this hairstyle? | Twist Wrap Ponytail | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
I'm loving this Twist Wrapped Ponytail style!  It's so great to use for any athletic event as it keeps the hair out of the face and help tightly. 
 It would also be great for a quick back to school hairstyle when you are running late or just want to add a little pop to a boring ponytail.  

Most of all I love this simple hairstyle because it makes for a great easy DIY hairstyle! 

Inspired by @erinbalogh :)

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHTwistWrapPony

Please be sure to click the "üîî" next to the SUBSCRIBE button, to join our Notification Squad for #PowerHour each week, and leave a comment below telling me what you would like to see next!

videos.title: Banded Twist Braid | Athletic Hairstyle | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Who else loves an easy hairstyle that can be either a great special event style OR a great athletic hairdo?  This #CGHbandedtwist is a great combination of banded ponytails and rope twists.  With all the elastics in place it makes for an easy DIY hairstyle that is sure to stay in place as your daughter is tumbling, dancing, running after a soccer ball, or scoring a free throw!  

We are always getting asked of simple hairstyles that keep the hair out of your face and still look good after a workout.  In this video we demo this style on a young girl, but I promise if you added more volume and looser bands and twists this could easily be turned into an adult style too!  

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHBandedTwist

Please be sure to click the "üîî" next to the SUBSCRIBE button, to join our Notification Squad for #PowerHour each week, and leave a comment below telling me what you would like to see next!

videos.title: 3 Easy DIY Hairstyles | Back to School | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
September brings the back to school season along with fall! Back to school brings early mornings, textbooks, and late nights with studying. I know I always rely on easy and simple hairstyles when I'm heading back to school so I can look cute, but still be on time to school. 

This video has three simple and easy DIY hairstyles that are sure to impress your friends. Because they are DIY hairstyles you won't need help or extra hands to create these styles! 

Hope you all enjoy your back to school fun, back to school hairstyles, and back to school outfits, but maybe not the back to school books, homework, and stress! Lol 

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGH3BackToSchool 

Please be sure to click the "üîî" next to the SUBSCRIBE button, to join our Notification Squad for #PowerHour each week, and leave a comment below telling me what you would like to see next!

üíã's -Jordan

videos.title: Rope Twist Combo Braid | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Click HERE to Subscribe to Kamri's new channel! http://www.youtube.com/user/kamrinoel?sub_confirmation=1

This is a perfect summer hairstyle when you're stuck in the endless heat and trying to keep your hair off your neck! It uses a rope twist, standard 3-strand braid, and fishtail braid, making it a pretty easy braid combo that anyone can do!

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHRopeTwistCombo

If you missed it, Kamri finally launched HER OWN CHANNEL!!! Her 1st video went live this past Thursday! (Click link above to see it!) Check in every Thursday afternoon for new videos from Kamri, you will LOVE them!

videos.title: How to Create a Rope Twist Headband | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Looking for a quick and easy braided headband hairstyle? Then you'll love this Rope Twist Headband!

Watch our FAMILY VLOGS here! http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_SCossQygjuhcUO9Uj6UnOz8nOhHXbp3

Girls are always looking for ways to pull their hair out of their face, and braided headbands is an easy way to do that. For today's tutorial, Brooklyn and I show you how to create a Rope Twist Headband, and two different ways to finish it off.

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHRopeTwistHeadband

If you know how to rope twist hair, then this hairstyle will be easy for you!  Please be sure to give this video a BIG "üëçüèª" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us what we should do for next week's #BehindTheBraids family vlog!

üíã's -Mindy

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 2 small hair elastics, 3 small bobby pins, hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3 minutes

Skill Level: Easy

videos.title: Rope Twisted Updo | Homecoming Hairstyles
videos.description:
Click to watch BrooklynAndBailey's "Get Ready With Me" HOMECOMING video here: https://youtu.be/gFgHpWaHHw8?list=UU6QWhGQqf0YDYdRb0n6ojWw
__

For today's tutorial, we are going to show you how to create Bailey's Rope Twisted Updo that she wore last weekend to Homecoming. {Be sure to check out Brooklyn's Half-Up Rosette tutorial from last week, that she wore to Homecoming!} 

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHRopeTwistUpdo

We've shown you how to create Rope Twists before, but this updo uses several of them which make for a very beautiful hairstyle for Prom, Homecoming, a wedding, or any other formal occasion.

If you want to add accessories, like I did in the video, they certain can take a hairstyle from beautiful to exquisite!

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "üëçüèª" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us if you want us to film a tutorial on how to prep hair for an elegant updo!

üíã's -Mindy
 

Items Needed: Undo prep, brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 3 small hair elastics, 10-12 bobby pins, accessories and hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 10-12 minutes

Skill Level: Hard

___

We post a new hairstyle tutorial every Sunday night {7pm CST}! 

So, please don't forget to subscribe to our YouTube channel...

videos.title: Rope Twisted Bun | Cute Prom Hairstyles
videos.description:
You can follow Kamri's Instagram account by clicking below!
http://www.instagram.com/kamrinoel

Today's hairstyle tutorial is part of our Prom series, where we show you cute hairstyles you can wear to your Prom, Homecoming, or other event. The twins were in LA this week, so Kamri offered to sit in.

To see your own photo recreations of this style featured in our app, feel free to tag your photos on IG with: #CGHRopeTwistBun

Rope twists are the easiest braids to create. This undo uses two rope twists that are then wrapped around each other and secured into a high bun. By fluffing the rope twists and leaving out a few curly strands/tendrils in the front by the face, this becomes the perfect Prom hairstyle!

For athletic events, all you have to to twist your rope twists tightly, adding pomade or hairspray to them, and then wrapping them tightly into a bun and securing them. {For sports, or ballet, do not fluff the rope braids as I did in the video... keep them tight.}

Please be sure to give this video a BIG "üëç" if you loved it, and leave a comment below telling us if you would like to see more Prom hairstyles!

*Inspired by TheBeautyDepartment.

üíã's -Mindy
 

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 2 ponytail holders, 2 small hair elastics, 8-10 bobby pins, hairspray and accessory {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3-5 minutes

Skill Level: Easy

To see step-by-step instructions and more photos of this style, please visit... http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com/?p=8536

videos.title: How to Create a Chain Link Braid | Sport Hairstyles
videos.description:
Be sure to follow us on Facebook, here: http://www.facebook.com/CuteGirlsHairstyles

____________________________

Congrats to Serena Zags, from the US, for winning our Frendz "Taylor" Headphones Giveaway!  

My girls have worn this Chain Link Braid off and on for several years now, however our updated version, with a new twist technique, in a combo, has become a personal favorite of Brooklyn & Bailey recently. {Our older, less tight version is called the Triple Twist Ponytail http://youtu.be/4uYcbea_8vo from back in July 2010.}

Because they are active in dance, tumbling, and cheer, they are always looking for tighter hairstyles that will keep their hair out of their faces. 

We are calling this the Chain Link Braid, because of the way you twist the hair... which makes it seriously look like links in a thick chain! 

The girls' friends have been wondering how to create this braid, so we thought we'd give you a tutorial using triple flip-unders as an accent {tutorial here... http://youtu.be/ltWT36r6SbM}.

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHChainLinkBraid

This hairstyle is perfect for any active sports, such as cheer, dance, gymnastics, volleyball, softball, etc, or for simple casual wear. The style is also unbelievably easy to recreate once you learn the twisting patterns! 

üíã's  
-Mindy

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 ponytail holder, 1 small hair elastic, hairspray and accessory {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3-5 minutes

Skill Level: Easy

To see step-by-step instructions and more photos of this style, please visit... http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com

____________________________

videos.title: The Run Braid Combo | Hairstyles for Sports
videos.description:
Wanna see hairstyle photos from before our CGH days? Click here to LIKE us on Facebook, and view our photo albums! http://www.facebook.com/CuteGirlsHairstyles

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

Everyone is always asking for hairstyles that can be worn for athletics, such as dance, cheer, softball, soccer, running, etc.

I am a huge Lulu Lemon fan, and follow them on Instagram, and saw this hairstyle come up on my Instagram feed. I just had to learn it, and then teach all of you!

To see your recreations featured in our CGH App, feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHRunBraidCombo

If you know how to French and simple braid, you really are good to go! This will keep the hair pulled out of your face, and your hair up off of your neck.

We are calling this a combo because you are combining several different braid styles into the look... French, simple, and rope braiding.

This happens to be one of Brooklyn's favorite braids right now, and leads to absolutely gorgeous 2nd-Day Curls the next day!

If you are reading this, please comment "Sports" below!

üíã -Mindy

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 ponytail holder, 3 small hair elastics, spray wax or hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 7-10 minutes

Skill Level: Medium

To see step-by-step instructions and more photos of this style, please visit... http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com

videos.title: Waterfall Twist Rope Braid | Summer Hairstyles
videos.description:
Summer is here, and my girls and I are always looking for styles that take the hair out of our face and off of our necks.

Kamri and I want to show you today how to create a combo hairstyle, using the Waterfall Twist and a Rope Braid. Combined, they make a very pretty look that's perfect for summertime, in or out of the pool, or simply out and about enjoying your day.

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHWaterfallRopeTwist

Enjoy!

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 small hair elastic, hairspray and accessory {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3 minutes

Skill Level: Easy

videos.title: How To Create Zig-Zag Twistbacks | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Be sure to check back next Sunday night for our special 250th video! We will have lots of fun things to share, and I GUARANTEE you will not want to miss it!

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

Taking a look back at my old photo albums from when the girls were little, I found this gem that we had never filmed before!

My 3rd daughter volunteered to be our model, and here we show you first how to create a zig-zag part, and then how to incorporate four twistbacks into an adorable tieback and bow. 

You could actually use this style in a combo with a bun, for a super beautiful updo. This hairstyle can be worn by girls of all ages, especially as "half-up, half-down" hairstyles are very popular right now!

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHZigZagTwists

Enjoy!

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 small hair elastic, spray wax or hairspray, accessory {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 5-8 minutes

Skill Level: Medium

videos.title: How to Create a Double Fishtail Twist | #CGHDoubleFishtailTwist
videos.description:

My Bailey is becoming quite a good little braider, and she agreed to show you another super cute braid that she has been wearing lately {with lots of compliments coming from her friends}!

videos.title: How to create a Crown Twist Braid | Updo Hairstyles
videos.description:
Tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHCrownTwist

Our Crown Braid tutorial from exactly two years ago has over 2.5 million views, so we know that you all love it!  If you have not seen it yet, you can view it here...

As such, we wanted to show you a super cute variation of that hairstyle using a rope braid/twist instead... #CGHCrownTwist! {It would look super cute as a wedding or flower girl hairstyle with flowers tucked into the twist.}  In terms of an updo, this one is FANTABULOUS!

CGH#3 volunteered to be my model today, and she looked radiant wearing it!  Be sure to comment, like, favorite, and subscribe!

Love you all!

Mindy

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 small hair elastic, 2-4 bobby pins, hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 5 minutes

Skill Level: Medium

To see step-by-step instructions and more photos of this style, please visit...

videos.title: Stacked Twist Ponytail | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Don't forget to follow CGH and BrooklynAndBailey on Instagram to see more behind-the-scenes photos!

http://www.instagram.com/CuteGirlsHairstyles
http://www.instagram.com/BrooklynAndBailey

Tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHStackedTwist

A few months ago we showed you how to create the Stacked Braid, and it has been very popular!  Click here to see that tutorial...  http://youtu.be/eRx2UjRjYDw

At the same time, we tried stacking the base braid with a rope braid twist on top and it is equally as cute!  You simply use the same technique in stacking the twist, only that you only pull out strands from the inside of the right most strand as you go down {to later incorporate in your stacked twist} rather than strands from both sides as in the stacked braids.  The video will make this clear.

My girls have worn this for several months and it gets just as many compliments as the Stacked Braids, only people are more curious at how the twist stays on top!  Try it, and see what your friends think!

Enjoy!

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 small hair elastic, 1 hairband, 2-3 bobby pins, and hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3-5 minutes

Skill Level: Medium

To see step-by-step instructions and more photos of this style, please visit...
http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com

videos.title: DIY Double Lace Twists | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Don't forget to subscribe to my twins' channel... http://www.youtube.com/BrooklynAndBailey

Our Same-Side Lace Braid video has been VERY popular, and Bailey knew it.  She took it upon herself to figure out how to get a similar look... but with twists!  Well, she figured it out!  

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHDoubleLaceTwists

Here Bailey shows us how to create Double Lace Twists on herself, simply to show you how easy it can be done!  {I love that my twinnies are getting creative with their own hair!}

This is literally a 3-minute hairstyle! If you like, you may begin with only one twist which is very cute as well! Please leave a comment below to let us know what you think!

Enjoy!

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 bobby pin, 1 small hair elastic, hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 2-3 minutes

Skill Level: Easy

videos.title: Hair-Wrapped Rope Braid {Plait} | Cute Girls Hairstyles
videos.description:
Rope braids {or plaits} are one of the more simple hairstyles one can learn, because you do not need to know how to braid... it is made up only of twists!  They are very pretty, and can be done in just a few minutes!

We have not shown you how to do a basic rope braid before, although we did show you a French version of it a few months ago.  You can view it here:

French Twist into Rope Braid
http://youtu.be/KYc8rJe7kTo

My niece Aniston {age 13} slept over at our house with the twins last weekend and she begged and begged for me to film a hairstyle on her!  How could I resist?  She has such gorgeous blonde hair, so we tried a few styles on her and together we decided on this version of the rope braid!  

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHHairWrapRopeBraid

Since Aniston is a "hair newbie", she wanted us to show her a simple hairstyle that she will be able to do on her own hair when she is home.

Enjoy!

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 large hairband, 1 small hair elastic,1-2 bobby pins, leather strand and hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3 minutes

Degree of Difficulty: Easy

To see step-by-step instructions and more photos of this style, please visit...
http://www.cutegirlshairstyles.com

This is a perfect hairstyle for those days or mornings when you have very little time on your hands.  I love it because this style is meant to be loose, giving it that romantic 'tousled' look in a braid that is super cute and trendy right now!  And... it takes no more than 3-5 minutes to complete!

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHSubtleSideTwist

We also included small snippets from our family videos this year of the kids' in their Halloween costumes!

Enjoy!

Items Needed: 1 hairband... that's it!  {hairspray and bobby pins optional}

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

It is time for another super easy hairstyle idea!  This style incorporates the French Twist technique and finishes off into a Rope Braid {Twist}.  Both techniques are super easy to learn and can be used in any number of hairstyle combinations.

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHFrenchRopeTwist

You can also wrap the rope braid into a bun and secure it for a beautiful-looking undo, and the style would also look great with second-day texture from braids the day before.

Enjoy!

Items Needed: Brush, rat-tail comb, spray bottle, 1 large hair elastic, hairspray {if desired}.

Time Requirement: 3-5 minutes

videos.description:

http://www.twitter.com/CuteGirlHair
http://www.pinterest.com/MrsHairdo
http://www.instagram/CuteGirlsHairstyles

* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *

Here is another super cute hairstyle in our Daddy 'Do series!  It uses a simple high ponytail, secured with a single hairband.  Then, take 1/4 of the ponytail and divide it... twisting the two sections around each other tightly and rubber band the end.  Do the same for the other three sections.  Accessorize as desired... and enjoy! 

Feel free to tag your own photos of this hairstyle with: #CGHFourTwistPony

You will notice that my husband is getting much better at securing elastics than he was in the previous Daddy Do's!  I taught him the trick this time! 

Enjoy!
